changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE access_module MODIFY COLUMN name ENUM('ERA_COMMONS', 'TWO_FACTOR_AUTH', 'RAS_ID_ME', 'RAS_LOGIN_GOV', 'IDENTITY', 'RT_COMPLIANCE_TRAINING', 'DATA_USER_CODE_OF_CONDUCT', 'PROFILE_CONFIRMATION', 'PUBLICATION_CONFIRMATION', 'CT_COMPLIANCE_TRAINING')
INSERT INTO access_module (name, expirable) VALUES('IDENTITY', false);

INSERT INTO user_access_module (access_module_id, user_id, bypass_time, completion_time) SELECT i.access_module_id, uam.user_id, uam.bypass_time, uam.completion_time FROM user_access_module AS uam INNER JOIN access_module AS am ON uam.access_module_id = am.access_module_id CROSS JOIN (SELECT access_module_id FROM access_module WHERE name = 'IDENTITY') AS i WHERE am.name = 'RAS_LOGIN_GOV';
